title: The Villainess Wants to Marry a Commoner!! (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Demon Lord   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Magical Space   Male Yandere   Nobles   Otome Game   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in a Game World   Skill Assimilation   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Anzutei Riko   杏亭リコ
description: After reincarnating, I found myself as the Villainess in an Otome game I often played. A prince, a knight, a magician…to these high-spec love interests I say ‘no thank you’! I’ll beat down all the destruction flags in my way with all my might to get happily married with my beloved character, the “Commoner”!>
